title: The Big fellow
creator_credit: Australian Broadcasting Commission, Kip Porteous and Michel Pearce
brief_description: Reconstructs the political career of J.T. Lang, Premier of New South Wales in 1925-1927 and 1930-1932, using contemporary film and stills and the recollections of some of the people most involved. Narrated by Allan Fraser. Suitable for upper secondary level.
creator_credit_for_label: Australian Broadcasting Commission, Kip Porteous and Michel Pearce
